basis: Historically, the user consistently translates plans into action (prepping grab-and-go items, using reminders, practicing urge-surf, and adjusting for heat and irregular days). This pattern supports a higher action propensity than mere verbal agreement.
coaching_notes: Maintain momentum with micro-commitments and scheduled check-ins. Track craving diaries and end-of-day resets to sustain progress on variable days. Reinforce positive feedback for small wins and keep plans adjustable to prevent burnout.
